edu.berkeley.me.jRonSim.house.thermostat
Class UserInterfaceTask

java.lang.Object
  TranRunJLite.TrjTask
      edu.berkeley.me.jRonSim.house.thermostat.UserInterfaceTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterfaceIO
public class UserInterfaceTask
extends TranRunJLite.TrjTask
implements UserInterfaceIO

The Task that implements the User Interface. If there is a GUI, the data from this task gets displayed. If there isn't a GUI, the data just lives here.

Author:
William Burke
